title: Diamond skull = dark obsession
creator_credit: Working Title Films, Channel Four, British Screen, Tim Bevan and Nicholas Broomfield
brief_description: Melodrama about sex and violence among the British aristocracy. Hugo, rich and titled, is insanely jealous of his business partner, Raul, whom he believes is having an affair with his wife Ginny. A drunken night turns into a nightmare and is the catalyst for further disaster. Cast includes Gabriel Byrne, Amanda Donohoe and Struan Rodger.
